accuracy_of_final_answer.description: The correctness of the final answer given by the multi-agent system.

completeness_of_task_execution.description: Whether all necessary steps required to complete the task were executed.

quality_of_information_sources.description: The reliability and authoritativeness of the sources used to gather information.

collaboration_efficiency.description: The effectiveness of cooperation among agents to complete the task.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the reasoning and thought process of the agents.

responsiveness_to_request_changes.description: The system's adaptability to request changes based on new or additional information.

time_efficiency.description: The speed at which the system completed the task.
